name: Sand and Wind
description:
Glide with the wind. Check out the small Cities around the map, the large Super City, the Flying Torus Airships, and the Mysterious Sky Discs.

Going up reduces speed, going down gains speed and gains Boost.

Fly into Bubbles to gain Full Speed and Full Boost.

CONTROLS

WASD - Control Glider

Shift - Use Boost to get more speed

Space - Lose speed and charge your Boost

Debug Controls

R - Set Y coord to 50

G - Refill Boost
